Actions.Name: Life Drain
Actions.Effects: A foe in range 3 takes 2 damage, ignoring vigor. If they are bloodied, they take 2 damage twice instead, ignoring vigor.

Actions.Name: Shriek
Actions.Description: All foes in range 2 must save or be forced to flee, shoving them 3 spaces in a direction of the Izenghast's choice, or 1 space on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Soul Drain
Actions.Description: The Izenghast reduces an adjacent character to 25% of their maximum hp, then gains vigor 1. When the ghasts's vigor is broken, that character recovers 50% of their maximum hp, healing it.
